1.content: Before the story begins you must choose your character.
1.title: Who are you?

choices: Wait for your roommate to arrive.
11.content:
"Are you sure you're going to be okay by yourself." your mother ask when the last box has been moved up to your new dorm room.

"Yes Mom." you lie. You're actually terrified, you've never been so far away from home and you don't know anyone here, but it's too late to change your mind now.

"Stop smothering the girl." your father pulls her away. "She'll be fine." He kisses you on the cheek. "Have fun Emma but call occasionally so your mother knows you're still alive."

"I will." You tell him. "Bye Dad. Bye Mum."

With that they leave, through your window you watch them drive away almost wishing you were in the car with them.

Your roommate hasn't arrived yet. You look nervously at their bare bed. It'll be so weird to share a room with a stranger. You hope that the two of you get along.
11.title: Emma - A Shy, quiet girl.

choices: Ask Sophia is she would like to join you for dinner.
111.content:
You sit on your bed with a book and wait.

About an hour later the door opens. A girl carrying two suitcases enters.

"Hi I'm Sophia." she puts down her bags. "I guess we're roommates."

"Hi I'm Emma" you greet her. "Can I help with anything."

"I'm not sure where I'm going to put everything yet." She says looking around the room. "Is this my bed?" she points to the bare mattress.

"Um. Yeah." you say.

As she unpacks, Sophia asks about your home town and why you came to this college. She seems friendly.

It is beginning to get late and you are getting hungry. You should figure out what you are going to do for dinner.
111.title: Wait for your roommate to arrive.

choices: Go with Sophia to her church group.
1111.content:
"I'm getting a bit hungry." you say to Sophia. "Do you want to come find something to eat?"

"Sorry" she says. "I'm having dinner with my church group."

"I thought you just moved here too?" you ask confused.

"When my pastor found out I was moving out here he put me in touch with them." she explains. "You can join us if you like. I'm sure they won't mind you coming along."
1111.title: Ask Sophia is she would like to join you for di...

11111.content:
"Thanks." You agree. "I need to make some friends here."

"I'm sure they will be very friendly." she says. "I think a few of them are even studying here."

As promised the group is very friendly. They make you feel welcome, even after they find out that you aren't a member of their denomination.

After the meal, everyone moves away from the table. They form small groups of 2 to 4 people where they carry on their own conversations.
11111.title: Go with Sophia to her church group.

111112.content:
You don't want to intrude on Sophia's conversation so you find a corner out of the way and try to disappear.

While you're wondering if it would be incredible rude to just disappear, you don't see Daniel, a guy who will be attending college with you, approach.

"What you doing over here by yourself?" he asks.

"I Um." you try to think of a reason other than your complete lack of social skills.

"You're shy?" he puts it as politely as possible.

"Yeah" you admit, blushing a little.

He gives you a warm smile "You're cute when you're embarrassed."

"Well you're in luck." you return the smile. "Because I'm embarrassed almost all the time."

Daniel laughs and you end up talking together until Sophia rejoins you.

"I'm getting a bit tired." she says. "I'm going to head back to the dorm."
111112.title: Sit by yourself.

1111121.content:
"I'd better go with you." you say. "I don't know If I can fin my way back alone."

"Goodnight then Emma." Daniel says "Hopefully we'll run into each other at college."

"That would be nice." you agree. "Goodnight Daniel."

That night Sophia questions you about Daniel. "So do you like him?"

"I don't know." you lie. "We just met."

"Well he likes you." She says. "I could tell."

"Really?" you ask, a little too excited.

"Ha!" She says. "I knew it, you like him too."

You pull your covers up over your face so she can't see your embarrassment.

"So I guess you're coming to church with me tomorrow." She says.
1111121.title: Go with Sophia.

11111211.content:
"Yes" you agree, eager to see Daniel again.

The following morning you accompany Sophia to church. She makes sure that you are sitting next to Daniel.

"Hi Emma." he greets you. "I didn't expect to see you here."

"Sophia wanted me to come." you lie but feel your cheeks go red.

"I'm glad you did." he smiles at you.

When the service is over, Daniel suggests to Sophia. "I should introduce you to the pastor."

"Good idea." Sophia agrees.

Daniel leads both of you over to the pastor. "This is Sophia and Emma." He says. "They will be living in the dorms at my college."

"Yes. Sophia's pastor told me she would be coming along." The pastor says. "Which church are you from Emma?"

"I don't have a church." you admit. "Sophia just brought me along."

"Are you thinking of joining us?" he asks.
11111211.title: Go to church with Sophia

111112111.content:
"Yes." you say. You want to see a lot more of Daniel. Also the rest of the church group have made you feel so welcome and you don't want to give that up.

"Excellent." the pastor says. "There is one problem though. It is our belief that all members must be raised in the faith."

"So you're saying I can't join?" you ask, confused.

"No. I'm not saying that" He says. "You just need to be raised again."

"What do you mean?" you ask, feeling even more confused.

"Someone from our church will need to take on the role of your parent." He explains. "And raise you as their child."

"Who?" you ask.

"She's already living with me." Sophia volunteers. "I could do it."

"Thankyou Sophia." the pastor says. "Or if Emma would feel more comfortable with a mother who is older I'm sure one of the women in our congregation will be happy to take on the role."
111112111.title: Say yes.

choices: Say that you are not wearing diapers.
1111121111.content:
"I guess it's simplest for Sophia to do it." you reason.

"Okay." the pastor says. "Daniel, could you introduce Sophia and Emma to Mrs Thompson. She's done this for a couple of our converts and can explain what they need to do."

"No problem." Daniel says and looks around the room until he spots Mrs Thompson. "There she is. Come on."

Daniel introduces you both to her and explains the situation.

"I will need to get some things ready." she says. "Come to my house for lunch at 12 and we'll go over things."

She gives you her address and you thank her before returning to the dormitory with Sophia.

"Do you know what's going on?" you ask. "You must have known other people who converted."

"Actually no." she admits. "Everyone in my church back home has been in it for generations. We don't recruit much."

Finally it is time to break the suspense and head to Mrs Thompson's house.

"Hello girls." she greets you at the door. "Come in."

She leads you into her living room. In the middle of the floor is something strange. A pink and white plastic mat, and next to it a package of disposable diapers, wipes and baby powder.

"Do you have a baby?" Sophia asks.

"No." Mrs Thompson smiles. "You do now."

"What?" she asks.

"Emma is now your baby." the older woman explains. "And the first thing you need to do is diaper her."

You and Sophia look at each other in shock.

"Undress her and make her lay down on the changing mat." She directs.

Sophia looks at you for permission.
1111121111.title: Choose Sophia

11111211111.content:
"Go ahead." you say, heading for the mat and laying down on it. Mrs. Thompson turns away at first, but is ready to turn back around at a moments notice. She decides to keep talking.
"Now, Sophie, you'll have to treat Emma just as you would a one-year-old child. That means diapering her, carrying her, pushing her in a stroller-don't worry, I have one large enough for her. I've done this before. You'll have to feed her, dress her- I've got some absolutely darling clothes for her to wear- punish her, whatever your parents did for you when you were a baby."
"Yes, ma'am." Sophie says, finishing up. She looks at Mrs. Thompson.
"Well, I have Baby diapered, but what do I dress her in?"
Mrs. Thompson goes to the back and comes back in with
11111211111.title: Tell her to go ahead.

choices: Ask Sophia to come with you
1111121112.content:
"I guess it' makes more sense to have someone older" you reason, assuming that your 'parent' is just meant to teach you about the religion.

"Okay." the pastor says. "Daniel, could you introduce Emma to Mrs Thompson. She's already done this for a couple of our converts."

"No problem." Daniel says and looks around the room until he spots Mrs Thompson. "There she is. Come on."

Daniel introduces you to her and explains the situation.

"I'm happy to help." She says. "I will need to get some things ready. Come to my house for lunch at 12 and we'll go over things."

She gives you her address and you thank her before returning to the dormitory with Sophia.

"Do you know what's going on?" you ask. "You must have known other people who converted."

"Actually no." she admits. "Everyone in my church back home has been in it for generations. We don't recruit much."

Finally it is time to break the suspense and head to Mrs Thompson's house.
1111121112.title: Choose someone older

11111211121.content:
"Hello Emma." she greets you at the door. "Come in."

She leads you into her living room. In the middle of the floor is something strange. A pink and white plastic mat, and next to it a package of disposable diapers, wipes and baby powder.

"What's that for?" you ask nervously.

"For you." She explains. "From right now you are my baby. I am going to raise you again."

"You mean I have to wear diapers?" you ask.

"You have to wear and use diapers." she says. "And drink from a baby bottle and everything else a baby does."

You can only stare with your mouth open, not believing what you're hearing.

"Let's get you undressed and into your diapers." She kneels down to remove your shoes.
11111211121.title: Go alone

11112.content:
You say, "Sorry, Sophia I'm a bit starved at that moment so I'm going to go find a place to eat. Maybe another time. Ok? "
Sophia, "Oh ok, have a nice meal."
You then leave.
You get out your phone and do a quick search for places to eat that are nearby.
-------------------------------
Search: Places to eat
-------------------------------
Results:
Drumlin Diner - Family owned restaurant.

More information about Drumlin Diner:

Dress code: Men: Semi-Casual (jeans or slacks, white or black dress shirt)
Women: Semi-Casual (loose jeans, skirt, or black dress. White or black dress shirt)

Please Note: Women are not allowed to wear bras under their dress shirts or dresses.
Men must wear formal dinning shoes.

More results:
Goodwin Formal Dining - A superb dining establishment.

More information about Goodwin Formal Dining:

Dress code: Men: Formal (jeans or slacks, white or black dress shirt)
Women: Semi-Formal (semi-short black pleated skirt, or black dress. Black dress shirt)

Please Note: Women's undergarments will be selected at the dining establishment by random draw, or randomly drawn out of a hat.
Men's undergarments will be selected by picking a number between 1 and 2. (1 for briefs, 2 for boxers)

--------------------------------------------------

You thought the dress codes were weird but,
they were the only places to eat that were close by so you choose...
11112.title: Say that you'd rather not.

choices: Apply for a part-time job with the babysitting service.
112.content:
You have no idea when your roommate will arrive. There's no point waiting around for hours so you head out to explore the college.

Near the entrance to the dorms you find a notice board. Amongst the bits of paper two catch your eye. One states that a sorority is looking for new members the other is from a babysitting service, advertising for part-time staff.
112.title: Explore the college.

choices: Tell her that you're trying to joing a sorority.
1121.content:
You've never been the popular girl but nobody here knows that. If you can join a sorority you would finally have a chance at being one of the people everyone else wants to be.

You follow the directions to the sorority house and knock on the door.

You almost jump when it opens, revealing a girl, maybe a year or two older than you.

"Yes?" she asks.

"I want to join your sorority." you blurt out.

She smiles. "Okay. All pledges need to be here at 6 pm sharp tonight."

"Thankyou." you say. "Do I need to bring anything."

"No." she says. "We'll take care of everything."

You return to your room to find another girl, unpacking.

"Hi." she introduces herself. "I'm Sophia."

"I'm Emma." you reply. "I guess you're my roommate."

You chat as she finishes unpacking. She seems like a nice person.
1121.title: Try to join the Sorority.

11211.content:
"Hey." you say. "Have you thought about joining a sorority?"

"Um. I guess." she says. "Why?"

"I'm going to try to join one tonight." you say. "Why don't you come too?"

"Um." she thinks for a moment. "Okay."

At quarter to 6 you return to the sorority house with Sophia. There are already two other girls waiting outside. They introduce themselves as Kate and Sally. Just before 6 a fourth girl arrives, running.

"I'm not late am I?" she asks.

"No." you tell her, looking at your watch. "I think you just made it."

"Cool." she says. "I'm Janet."

"Emma." you introduce yourself. "This is Sophia."

That moment the front door opens and a group of girls emerge from the house. "Welcome pledges. My name is Laura" announces one of the eldest. "Come inside and we will get started with your initiation."

She leads you all inside. The house is amazing, it would be a much nicer place to stay than the dormitory.

"This will be your room." she says, opening a door. "Until you quit or we accept you as full members."

The four of you file into the room and are shocked by what you find. It looks like a large nursery. There is a queen-sized bed against one of the walls with a high rail around it, making it into a giant cot. On the opposite wall is a large table with a padded plastic top. The stacks of diapers and changing supplies on the shelves underneath give away it's purpose.

"What the hell is this?" Sally demands.

"All members of our sorority must start as babies." Laura explains. "If you don't like it then leave."

Sally does exactly that. "No sorority is worth this." Kate follows her.

You look at Sophia for some idea what to do but she appears to be waiting for you to make the decision.
11211.title: Tell her that you're trying to joing a soro...

112112.content:
"I've come too far to turn back now." you say. "If these other girls did it to get in. I can too."

"Okay." Sophia decides. "I'm staying too."

Janet looks uncertain.
112112.title: Stay

choices: They lead you into the kitchen, where they fix bottles for you
1121122.content:
"Your choice, Janet." You tell her.
"If you can make it, so can I."
"Good! Three sweet new pledges! Let's get them set up, shall we, girls?"
The other sorority members lead the three of you to the changing tables.The pledges climbed up one by one-You, Sophia, then Janet.
Each sister undresses, diapers, then redresses one each.
"Okay, pledges. Remember who diapered and dressed you. She will be your mommy until you become full sisters" Laura explains.
What next?
1121122.title: Let Janet decide for herself

11212.content:
At quarter to 6 you return to the sorority house. There are already two other girls waiting outside. They introduce themselves as Kate and Sally. Just before 6 a fourth girl arrives, running.

"I'm not late am I?" she asks.

"No." you tell her, looking at your watch. "I think you just made it."

"Cool." she says. "I'm Janet."

"Emma." you introduce yourself.

That moment the front door opens and a group of girls emerge from the house. "Welcome pledges. My name is Laura" announces one of the eldest. "Come inside and we will get started with your initiation."

She leads you all inside. The house is amazing, it would be a much nicer place to stay than the dormitory.

"This will be your room." she says, opening a door. "Until you quit or we accept you as full members."

The four of you file into the room and are shocked by what you find. It looks like a large nursery. There is a queen-sized bed against one of the walls with a high rail around it, making it into a giant cot. On the opposite wall is a large table with a padded plastic top. The stacks of diapers and changing supplies on the shelves underneath give away it's purpose.

"What the hell is this?" Sally demands.

"All members of our sorority must start as babies." Laura explains. "If you don't like it then leave."

Sally does exactly that. "No sorority is worth this." Kate follows her.
11212.title: Don't mention the sorority.

choices: Tell her about the babysitting job.
1122.content:
You could use some money so you tear off one of the strips of paper with contact details at the bottom of the advertisement and find somewhere quiet to call.

"Hell, Happy Baby Babysitting." A woman answers. "How can I help you."

"Hi." you say. "I'm calling about the part-time job."

"Please hold while I transfer you through to the manager." The voice says.

"Hello." the manager answers. "This is Harriet Davidson."

"Hi." you repeat yourself. "My name is Emma, I was interested in the part-time job you were advertising."

"We have very high standards for our staff at Happy Baby Babysitting." She says.

"I babysat for a few of our neighbors." you offer. "I can give you their details, I'm sure they will give me good references."

"That won't be necessary." She says. "We have a very thorough training program. By the end of it we will know if you are the sort of person we are looking for."

You arrange to meet Harriet at her office after class on Monday then return to your room.

You find another girl, unpacking.

"Hi." she introduces herself. "I'm Sophia."

"I'm Emma." you reply. "I guess you're my roommate."

You chat as she finishes unpacking. She seems like a nice person.
1122.title: Apply for a part-time job with the babysitting ...

11221.content:
"Are you going to be looking for a job?" you ask.

"Yeah. Probably." she says. "Why?"

"There's a babysitting service advertising for part-time staff on the noticeboard downstairs." you say. "I applied just before you got here."

"I don't want to take the job from you." she says.

"I think they have more than one position." you tell her, giving her the contact details. "You should apply too."

"Thanks." she says and calls right away. Harriet arranges for her to come in on Monday afternoon too.

Monday comes and your classes go by slowly. It's only the first week so the lecturers are just telling you what the unit will be about, information you already knew when you enrolled.

Finally it is time for you and Sophia to head to Happy Baby Babysitting to meet Harriet.

"Hi I'm Sophia and this is Emma." Sophia introduces you both at the front desk. "We're here to see Harriet Davidson"

"Just through there." the secretary points to a set of double doors. "They will be starting in a few minutes."

You follow Sophia through the doors into a large hall. Ten other girls are already waiting there, looking just as confused as you.

As promised, a few minutes later a woman enters, followed by 4 girls, about your age, maybe some a little older.

"Good afternoon girls. Thankyou all for coming" the woman introduces herself and the others. "I'm Harriet Davidson. These young women are Jane, Kelly, Samantha and Rita. They will be starting the final stage of their training today. That involves working with you."

"It must be some sort of mentor thing." Sophia whispers to you. "They really take this seriously for a babysitting service."

"Quiet please." Harriet says. "Now in the first stage of your training you will take on the role of toddlers."

"What?" one of the girls asks. "We're here to take care of babies, not act like them."

"Let me explain Danielle." Harriet tells the girl. "In this stage you will learn to empathise with the children you will be caring for. You will also be assisting with the training of these young women. Their final stage of training is to practice their skills by taking care of you."

"What does that mean specifically?" Sophia asks nervously.

"You will be in diapers for the duration of stage 1. That is full-time." Harriet explains. "When you aren't here you may change yourselves but during these training sessions your assigned babysitter will be responsible for your changes."

"Changes?" another girl asks. "Like diaper changes. You expect us to use diapers."

"Yes Jessica." Harriet says. "You must appreciate what it is like to be in diapers like the children you will be caring for. You will be given a harmless drug which will make you temporarily lose control of your bladder and bowels."

"This is crazy." a voice declares. "I'm not going to shit myself in public just to get this job."

"The drug generally causes you to soil your diaper within an hour or two of taking it so you should only mess while you are here." Harriet explains. "I should also point out that those of you who participate in the training program will receive full pay and for those of you in College, this course gives you credit toward you graduation. However, anyone who doesn't want to participate is welcome to leave."

Most of the girls aren't convinced and begin to leave. Harriet doesn't look surprised. You guess that she invited so many because most leave when the training is explained.
11221.title: Tell her about the babysitting job.

112212.content:
You decide to stay but you are in the minority. Including you, only four recruits remain.

Sophia is on her way out of the door with the others. "Aren't you coming Emma?" She turns back when she realises you aren't with her. "You can't really be doing this."
112212.title: Stay

1122121.content:
"It won't be that bad." you argue. "Those four made it through this stage so it must be worth it."

"Won't be that bad?" she responds. "You're going to be messing yourself."

"Please stay." you say. "We both need the money and it'll be easier if we're both in diapers."

She thinks about it for a moment then decides. "Okay. I'm in, but you owe me."

"Five left." Harriet observes. "Not bad." She begins assigning 'babies' to their 'babysitters'. "Kelly, you can take care of Emma and Sophia."

Each of the other babysitters is given one baby to care for, then Harriet passes out large bags. "These are your diaper bags. Each baby will need to take one home and bring it with them to each training session. They contain your diapers and all of your changing supplies."

You open your bad when you get it and look inside. There's a number of adult-sized diapers but with cute baby-style prints. You almost laugh at the idea of wearing one of them. There's also a padded plastic changing mat, baby-wipes and baby powder.

"Time to get your babies diapered." Harriet declares.

"Okay, who's first?" Kelly asks.

Sophia quickly points at you. "Emma. She can't wait to start pooping in her pants."

You glare at her but pass your diaper bag to Kelly.

Kelly takes out the changing mat and unfolds it onto the ground, then removes your shoes and your pants. You blush at being undressed in front of everyone but don't try to stop her.

Then she pulls down your panties. You gasp and cover yourself with your hands.

"Babies don't get to be self-conscious." Kelly says with a laugh. "Now lay down."

You lay down on the map, still covering your privates.

Kelly takes out one of your diapers and unfolds it. "Lift your bottom." she directs then slides the diaper under you. "Good girl." She pulls the diaper up between your legs, pushing your hands out of the way, then pulls the sides into place and tapes you into the diaper. She checks her work before helping you to your feet.

"Okay Sophia, you're next." She says.

Sophia reluctantly submits to being undressed and lays down on the changing mat. "I can't believe I let you talk me into this."

Soon she is diapered too.

When all of the babies are diapered, Harriet says. "During each training session you will be fed a bottle of formula. That bottle contains the drug which makes you use your diapers. The effect should last until the next session."

The babysitters collect the bottles. Kelly returns with two and holds one to your lips.
1122121.title: Convince her to stay.

choices: You feel a cramp coming on
11221211.content: As soon as the first few drops touch your tongue you cannot resist the formula. You start gulping it down and in a few seconds the milk like substance is gone
11221211.title: Drink the bottle.

choices: Refuse to go to the naughty corner
11221212.content:
You close your lips tight and shake your head.

"You agreed to this." Kelly insists. "Drink your bottle or you'll be kicked out."

"No she won't" Harriet overhears Kelly. "She's a toddler, you're the babysitter. It's your responsibility to make her drink her bottle."

Playing the part, you cross your arms and stick your tongue out at Kelly.

"Go and sit in the naughty corner, facing the wall." she tells you, pointing to a corner of the room. "You can come back when you're ready to drink your bottle."
11221212.title: Refuse to drink the bottle.

112212121.content:
You go to the corner and sit down facing the wall. At least you got out of drinking that stuff that would make you soil yourself.

The others finish drinking their bottles and your hear them playing. Despite the childish nature of the games it sounds like they are having fun.

You ignore them and focus on winning this battle of wills. Unfortunately you begin to feel the need to pee.
112212121.title: Go to the naughty corner

choices: Tell Kelly that you need your diaper changed.
1122121211.content:
You hold on but the pressure builds.

You notice the smell of poo and guess that some of the others have already started messing themselves.

"Did Sophia go poopies?" you Kelly asks, causing you to giggle. "Let's get you changed."

You hear the tapes of Sophia's diaper being opened and Kelly comments. "You have made a big mess haven't you?"

Similar sounds of the others being changed soon follow.

Eventually you need to wriggle about on you bottom to keep holding on.

"Emma." Kelly tells you off "Sit still."

You do and your bladder finally releases. You are almost relieved as you flood your diaper.

For a moment it feels like you are sitting in a puddle. Then the diaper begins to absorb the liquid and you are left feeling only damp and uncomfortable.
1122121211.title: Hold on.

choices: Tell her you're just going to get into the shower.
11221212111.content:
"Kelly" you motion for her to come to you.

"What is it?" she asks.

"My diaper is wet." you say.

"Drink your bottle and I'll change you." she offers.

"Okay." you finally agree.

"Good girl." she smiles, more at her victory than at you.

She leads you by the hand back to where Sophia is playing. Your soggy diaper droops heavily, making you waddle slightly as you walk.

Kelly hands you the bottle. "Drink it all and then I'll change your diaper." she repeats.

You begin sucking on the nipple. The formula doesn't taste too bad and you are thirsty so you finish it quickly.

"There, that wasn't so bad was it?" she says. "Now lay down on the changing mat and I'll get you into a nice dry diaper."

You do as you are told and she untapes your diaper and pulls it open between your legs. Next she wipes you thoroughly with a baby wipe. It feels cold against your skin but you are glad to no longer have your bottom covered with pee. She rolls up the used diaper and replaces it with a dry one and then tapes you securely into it.

She then reads a story to you and Sophia before Harriet declares. "Time to go home girls. Babysitters, give them one last diaper check."

Kelly checks your diaper by first pulling out the waistband at the back, then sticking a finger in the leg hole. "You're clean." she declares before giving Sophia the same undignified treatment.

You are finally allowed to pull your pants and shoes back on.

"Don't forget your diaper bags." Harriet reminds everyone. "See you back here tomorrow afternoon."

You and Sophia head back to the dorm together.

"I guess it wasn't so bad." Sophia decides. "It's an easy way yo get course credit."

You have just gotten back into your dorm room when it becomes clear why you were meant to have the bottle at the start of the training session. Without warning, poop squeezes out of your bottom, filling the seat of your diaper.

"What's wrong." Sophia asks, seeing your look of surprise. Then she smells it. "You just messed yourself didn't you."

You nod.

"Do you need some help getting cleaned up." she offers.
11221212111.title: Tell Kelly that you need your diaper changed.

112212122.content:
"Make me." You say.

Kelly takes out her mobile phone and uses it to take a photo of you. "Do as you are told or I'll post that on Facebook."
112212122.title: Refuse to go to the naughty corner

choices: pick you up and carry you to the naughty corner.
Take your diaper off and spank you.
1122121222.content:
Harriet overhears.
"Kelly, you know better than to threaten a toddler. You to convince them to do as you say. And threatening or punishing is not convincing."
"How do I convince a toddler to anything?" Kelly asks.
"How did you get this far in your training?" You ask.
"Now, Emma, there's no need for that kind of attitude." Harriet says.
You stick your tongue out at her.
"I see someone's getting into her roll."
Kelly decides to
1122121222.title: Tell her she wouldn't dare.

1122122.content:
"I need the money." you explain. "I don't think it'll be that bad."

"Okay." she says. "See you back at the dorm. I hope your diapers don't smell too bad."

"Four left." Harriet observes. "That's about what I expected." She begins assigning 'babies' to their 'babysitters'. "Kelly, you can take care of Emma."

Each of the other babysitters is paired with a baby to care for, then Harriet passes out large bags. "These are your diaper bags. Each baby will need to take one home and bring it with them to each training session. They contain your diapers and all of your changing supplies."

You open your bag when you get it and look inside. There's a number of adult-sized diapers but with cute baby-style prints. You almost laugh at the idea of wearing one of them. There's also a padded plastic changing mat, baby-wipes and baby powder.

"Time to get your babies diapered." Harriet declares.

Kelly takes out the changing mat and unfolds it onto the ground, then removes your shoes and your pants. You blush at being undressed in front of everyone but don't try to stop her.

Then she pulls down your panties. You gasp and cover yourself with your hands.

"Babies don't get to be self-conscious." Kelly says with a laugh. "Now lay down."

You lay down on the mat, still covering your privates.

Kelly takes out one of your diapers and unfolds it. "Lift your bottom." she directs then slides the diaper under you. "Good girl." She pulls the diaper up between your legs, pushing your hands out of the way, then pulls the sides into place and tapes you into the diaper. She checks her work before helping you to your feet.

When all of the babies are diapered, Harriet says. "During each training session you will be fed a bottle of formula. That bottle contains the drug which makes you use your diapers. The effect should last until the next session."

The babysitters collect the bottles. Kelly returns with two and holds one to your lips.

"How long until the drug kicks in?" you ask.
"I don't know." Kelly admits. She turns to ask Ms.Harriet.

15.content: Who are you and what is your secret?
15.title: Someone with an interesting secret.

choices: Tell her that you wet the bed.
151.content:
"There's two beds." you say. It's the first thing you notice about your new dorm room. "Did you know that these rooms were shared."

"It's not a big deal Sarah." Your father says, coming through the door behind you with one of your suitcases. "I shared a room in college."

"But Dad." you complain. "What about my... problem."

"You know she still wets the bed." your mother reminds him, bringing in the last box.

"Shh!" you say. "I don't want the entire building to know."

"I'm sure that arrangements can be made for you." your mother says and leads you out of the room to find the dormitory manager's office.

"How can I help you?" Mrs Fraser, the dorm manager asks.

"My daughter Sarah would rather not share with another student." Your mother says.

"I'm afraid I can't help you." Mrs Fraser says. "All of our rooms are doubles and I can't go giving students rooms to themselves just because they don't want to share."
151.title: Sarah - A girl who still wets the bed.

1511.content:
"Come on Mom." you say. "It's no use arguing."

Once back in your room your mother explains the situation to your father.

"We could find her a room to rent somewhere in town." he suggests.
1511.title: Leave the office.

choices: Tell her you thought you saw a spider.
15112.content:
"No." you say. "I want to stay on campus."

"Okay." your mother says. "Did you pack your diapers?"

"Yes mom." you tell her, looking around and blushing. Fortunately nobody was close enough to hear.

You say goodbye to your parents and return to your room to find another girl, already unpacking.

"Hi." you introduce yourself. "I'm Sarah. I guess we're roommates."

"I'm Jessica." she replies.

You chat as you unpack. She seems like a nice person.

You open the last bag and see that it contains, among other thing your diapers. You slam it shut, hoping that Jessica didn't see.

"What's wrong?" she asks, concerned by your strange behavior.
15112.title: Stay in the dorm.

151121.content:
"Promise you won't laugh." you say.

She looks at you, confused, but agrees "I promise."

You open the bag again. "I didn't want you to see these."

"Diapers?" she asks. "You wear diapers?"

"Only at night." you say. "I have a bit of a bed-wetting problem."

"I'm sure heaps of people our age still wet the bed." She says, unconvincingly.

"You're not going to tell anyone are you?" you ask.

"No." she says. "Don't worry."

You spend the rest of the afternoon exploring the campus and that evening getting to know Jessica. You eventually grow tired and it's time to put on a diaper before you get into bed.
151121.title: Tell her the truth.

Sarah decides that she will change in dorm room. As she starts to get the diaper out, her roommate comes back in. Sarah panics, but Jessica tells her not to worry, and says I just have a question for you, can I change your diaper for you?

How does Sarah respond?

"Oh, no thanks. I have a little sister. I baby-sit her all the time." Jessica begins the change. In no time at all, she's taping you up and throwing away the used supllies.
"So now what do we do?" she asks.

You put the bag, still packed, in your wardrobe.

"I'm going to have a look around campus ." Jessica says. "Want to come?"

"I think I'll stay here for a while." you say.

1511222.title: Stay in the room.

1512.content:
"It's not that I don't want to share." you say. "I have a .... problem."

"What sort of problem?" Mrs Fraser asks.

"She wets the bed." your mother answers, making you turn red.

"I see." she says. "I'm afraid that we don't have the facilities to accommodate you here."

"Where will I stay?" you ask.

"We have had a few students with your problem over the years." She says, taking down a file from her bookcase. "There are a couple of alternatives we've found." She opens the file and searches through the sheets of paper. "There is a boarding school within walking distance which has a special program for bedwetters. In the past they have been prepared to let out students stay there."

"What's the other option?" you ask, not liking the first too much.

"The medical faculty here have a facility where they study bedwetting and develop treatments for it." She explains. "Volunteers, naturally, have to spend their nights in the facility so they have rooms. I understand that they are quite comfortable."
1512.title: Tell her that you wet the bed.

choices: Insist that you're not staying with the little kids.
15121.content:
"I'll stay at the boarding school." you decide. "I don't much like the idea of being a lab rat."

"Okay. I'll make the arrangements." Mrs Fraser says. "Here's the address." she passes a card to your mother.

Everything is packed back into your parent's car and you make the short drive to the school. It's a large school, combining an elementary school and a high school

Your dad parks near the office.

A woman is waiting for you outside. "Hi You must be Sarah." She greet you. "Mrs Fraser said you were on your way over. I'm Miss Jones."

"Thank you for letting her stay here." your mother says.

"It's not a problem. We had a spare room." she says. "Bring your bags, I'll show you where to go."

You and your parents retrieve your bags from the car and follow Miss Jones into the school. You see students moving around the halls and notice that none of them seem to be old enough to be in highschool.

"Where are the highshool kids?" you ask.

"They are in another part of the school." Miss Jones explains as she leads you down a corridor. "This is the elementary section."

She stops at a door. "This is your room."

"I'm staying here?" you ask.

"Yes. The bedwetting program is run in the elementary school dorms." She informs you. "Most of the kids stop wetting by the time they reach highschool."
15121.title: Stay in the boarding school.

"Come see me in my office once you are settled in. We need to discuss how we will be managing your problem." She tells you before leaving. "If you get lost, ask one of the kids."

Your parents also say goodbye, although much more slowly and only leave once you promise to call at least once a week. You finish unpacking and head off to find Miss Jones.

You had some time to kill, so you decided to go...
154.title: John - A guy who likes to wear diapers.

choices: You stand there quiet as a mouse
You keep staring at her skirt
You say hi like a normal person
1541.content: You head over to the new club in one of the on campus buildings. You notice a girl with blonde hair, blue eyes, wearing a yellow shirt with a high skirt, visibly showing a bulgy diaper, but you put it out of your mind, thinking to yourself that you're hallucinating. She looks at you...
1541.title: to see about a new club

15413.content: She says hi back and smiles, you then notice that her face turns red and she can't speak anymore, and all you hear is a hissing sound coming from her skirt. So you say...
15413.title: You say hi like a normal person

155.content:
You are disappointed when you open the door to your dorm room and see two beds. You didn't realise that you would be sharing a room.

Your whole reason for choosing a college this far from home was to get away from your parents and have some privacy. Privacy to explore a side of yourself that you've had to repress most of your life.

For as long as you've been aware that boys and girls are different you've felt that you would much rather have been a girl.

Fairly early, you learned the hard way that boys are not meant to want to be girls. Your parents laughed at you when you were four and you told them you wanted a pretty dress for your birthday and you were teased by everyone in your class on your first day of school when you asked one of the girls if you could play dolls with her.

Since then you've kept your feelings to yourself. You've bought a few cute dresses and other items like bras and panties. You've worn them when you had a few hours to yourself but you've but that's not really enough.

You've brought your secret stash of clothes with you and you've been saving up to buy more but now you realise that you're going to have even less privacy than at home.

You do your best not to show your disappointment to your parents as they help you bring everything up to your room and say goodbye.
155.title: Stephen - A guy who wants to be a girl.

choices: Put the idea out of your mind.
1552.content:
You have no idea when your roommate will arrive. There's no point waiting around for hours so you head out to explore the college.

Near the entrance to the dorms you find a notice board. Amongst the bits of paper one catches your eye. A sorority is looking for new members. You get the crazy idea that maybe you could join.
1552.title: Explore the college.

15521.content: Would they let you in if you told them the truth. That you really want to be a girl? What if you just went dressed as a girl, would they be able to tell?
15521.title: Try to join the sorority.

155211.content:
Even if you could convince them that you're a girl they would eventually discover the truth and probably wouldn't be very happy about the deception.

Instead, you go to the sorority house as you are and knock on the door.

You almost jump when it opens, revealing a girl, maybe a year or two older than you.

"Yes?" she asks.

"I want to join your sorority." you blurt out.

She rolls her eyes. "You frat boys need to be a bit more creative with your pranks. At least wear a dress next time."

"No" you insist. "I'm not in a fraternity."

"So what is it?" she asks. "Expecting to have half-naked pillow fights with us?"

"No." you say. "I want to join because I really want to be a girl."

Her expression softens. "Really?"

You nod, blushing.

"Okay, come inside." She smiles and takes you by the hand. "I'm Rachel."

She makes coffee and asks you about your desire to be a girl. She seems sympathetic.

"I will talk to the others." She says. "I'm sure they will understand. Come back at 6 tonight. That's when all of the new pledges arrive."

You thank her and return to your dorm room. It looks like your roommate has arrived because the other side of the room is now cluttered with boxes. It's not clear where he's gone.

As 6 draws closer you wonder if you should go dressed as a girl, to show that you are serious about this.
155211.title: Be honest.

1552111.content: You return to the sorority to find 3 girls waiting outside. They give you odd looks. obviously wondering what you are doing here.
1552111.title: Go as you are.

choices: Explain to them why you're joining.
15521111.content:
"Hi." you say to the girls. "I'm Stephen."

"Hi. I'm Janet." one girl tells you. "These are Kate and Sally."

"What are you doing here?" Kate asks, in a rather unfriendly tone.

"I'm trying to join the Sorority." you say.

Sally bursts out laughing. "No really. What are you doing?"
15521111.title: Introduce yourself.

155211112.content:
This was a bad idea. Now you just want to get out of here.

You turn and start back toward your dorm.

"Wait." Janet calls after you. "Stephen."
155211112.title: Leave.

1552111121.content:
You stop and turn back toward Janet as she catches up with you.

"Wait." she repeats. "Why are you going?

"I can't do this." you say, defeated.

"Why did you want to?" she asks, gently taking your hand.

"Because I want to be a girl." you tell her, explaining badly. "I thought I could join and be one of the girls."

"Well don't give up." she says, pulling you back to the sorority house. "Those girl don't get to decide if you can join."

You follow her back. "Thanks." you say.

That moment the front door opens and a group of girls emerge from the house. "Welcome pledges. My name is Laura" announces one of the eldest. "Come inside and we will get started with your initiation."


"Where do you think you're going?" Sally asks as you follow them inside.

"Stephen is a pledge too." Rachel says.

"What?" Kate asks. "I thought he was joking."

"This is ridiculous." Sally says. "I'm not joining this Sorority."

"Me either." adds Kate.

The two of the leave.

"Oh well." Laura says. "We've still go two. Come on."

She leads you and Janet inside. The house is amazing, it would be a much nicer place to stay than the dormitory.

"This will be your room." she says, opening a door. "Until you quit or we accept you as full members."

The four of you file into the room and are shocked by what you find. It looks like a large nursery. There is a queen-sized bed against one of the walls with a high rail around it, making it into a giant cot. On the opposite wall is a large table with a padded plastic top. The stacks of diapers and changing supplies on the shelves underneath give away it's purpose.

"What's going on?" Janet asks.

"All members of our sorority must start as babies." Laura explains. "Do you have a problem with that?"

Janet gives you a look which asks "Can we really go through with this?"
1552111121.title: Stop.

15521111211.content:
"I've come too far to turn back now." you say. "If all of these girls did it to get in. I can too."

"Okay." Janet decides. "I'm staying too."

"Good." Laura smiles "Who's going first?"

Janet pushes you forward.

"Okay Stephanie." Laura says, choosing a girl's name for you. "Strip and get up on the changing table."

You get undressed and climb, completely naked, onto the padded plastic top of the changing table.

"Good girl." She praises you, retrieving a large disposable diaper from under the table and unfolding it. "Lift your bottom."

You obey and she slides the diaper under you. She pulls the front of the diaper up firmly between your legs and fastens the tapes.

"All done." she helps you down from the table then turns to Janet. "Your turn."

Janet undresses and climbs onto the table. You watch as Laura diapers Janet then helps her down from the table.

You are both dressed in pink t-shirts which say "Baby Girl" then taken out to the living room to the cheers and laughter of the other girls.

"I'd like you all to meet Baby Stephanie and Baby Janet" Laura introduces you both.

"Are they staying up for the party?" Rachel asks.

"What party?" Janet asks concerned?

"We're having a party tonight." Laura informs her. "You can stay up if you like or go to bed before everyone gets here."
15521111211.title: Stay

choices: Let Janet stay away from the party
Try to convince Janet to join the party too.
155211112111.content:
"I want to join this sorority because I am looking for a place, where I can be my true self, if I won't make it into this sorority, then the party tonight could be me only chance to express my inner-self without feeling weird for a very long time. I have to use this chance even if that means that I have to hulimate myself by acting and dressing like a baby". you admit to the girls.

"And what will you do Janet?" you ask.

"I am not as brave as you are Stephanie. I think I will just go to bed early." Janet answers.


Now you have to decide if you let Janet stay away from the party or if you try to convince her to join the party too.
155211112111.title: Stay up.

choices: She talks you into going to bed with her.
1552111121112.content:
"Come on, Janet. When will you have this kind of chance again?"
"There will be other parties." She said.
"Well, yes, there will be. But if you to bed now, you'll always be known as the girl who missed out on the first party of the year."
"Yes, but we have orientation starting tomorrow."
"Yes, but we can be late to that. We have senior sisters who can help us out with that."
1552111121112.title: Try to convince Janet to join the party too.

info.brief_description: You want to fit in at your new college but when you try to join a club you end up diapered
info.description:
If you like reading or writing interactive stories with AB/DL themes please check this subreddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/DiaperedRoleplay/

You have just started at a college far from your home town. You don't know anyone so you are eager to join a club and make friends. However you discover that the club insists on a rather embarrassing initiation before you can become a full member.

After the first "character selection" choice this story should be written in the style of a "choose your own adventure" book. That means keep the point of view 2nd person (The main character of the story is referred to as "You" - the reader) and limit options to choices that character can make, not events outside his/her control. Eg "Which door will you open? 1) The red door 2) The green door" is good but "What do you find behind the red door? 1) An over-sized nursery 2) The girls' locker room." is not.
